post:
HostXNow provides affordable and reliable web hosting services using the latest cloud infrastructure technology and Intel processors and a minimum of 32 gigabytes of ram. Our services are hosted in the OVH Datacenters in London, UK and Vint Hill, United States. Our services include Unlimited Traffic and up to 2 Gbit/s bandwidth to ensure speed and reliability to clients.

We are offering a great deal for new clients, which includes a free domain name registration - only applies to annual plan (.com, .net, .org, .info, .uk, .co.uk) and receive 50% off for the first invoice with us when using promo code: 50OFF

We guarantee 99.9% uptime for ALL of our services and a 30 day money back guarantee, which means if you are not happy with our services within 30 days, we will refund your payment no questions asked.

Moving from another host? Just open a ticket after signing up with us, and we will migrate all of your data for you for free, and it can be as many accounts as you have, with no limits.

--------------------------------------------------

Main Features

30 Day Money Back Guarantee
99.9% Uptime Guarantee (SLA Policy)
24/7/365 Technical Support Available via Live Chat, Email and Support Ticketing System
Free Unlimited Migrations from other Web Hosting Providers
Daily Acronis Backups (6 Months Retention)
Daily JetBackup Backups (7 Days Retention)
Imunify360 Virus/Malware Scanner
Free SSLs (cPanel AutoSSL)
LiteSpeed Web Server
LSCache (Caching for WordPress)
WordPress Optimised
Unlimited Traffic and up to 2 Gbit/s bandwidth
Free MailChannels Outgoing Spam Filter
Free MagicSpam Incoming spam Filter
Latest cPanel and CloudLinux w/ CageFS
Auto Script Installer (Softaculous Premium) - Install WordPress within seconds!
Multiple PHP Versions (5.2 to 8.0)
Easily configure PHP Modules and Extensions
Cloudflare cPanel Plugin
Free Drag and Drop Website Builder (SitePad)
1,000s of Free Themes and Plugins

--------------------------------------------------

Datacenter Location

London, UK
Vint Hill, USA

You can select a location during checkout.

50% OFF First Invoice

Use promotion code: 50OFF
